about.title: About me
about.intro: Hello! I'm Jorge, a Full Stack developer passionate about creating products that live on the internet. My interest in web development started in 2019, when I began experimenting with HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Python, and gradually incorporated backend technologies like Java, Spring Boot and SQL and NoSQL databases.
about.description: Full Stack Developer specialized in creating user-centered web solutions, with training in Artificial Intelligence and Big Data, working with

description: Development of a web dashboard for Ka0s, using CI/CD workflows with GitHub Actions to generate the HTML, CSS and JavaScript structure.
Integration of system information through JSON files, ensuring consistent and maintainable data loading.
Continuous deployment of the dashboard to the web server, improving speed and reliability in delivering new versions.

prohogar.description: Mobile application for hiring home services, allowing users to search, compare and request professionals in a simple and centralized way.

agrogestion.description: AgroGestion is a web application for agricultural management developed with Next.js and TypeScript. It provides components for authentication, expense management and PDF generation, designed as a base for farm administration and agricultural data projects.

dam.degree: Higher Degree in Multiplatform Application Development
dam.description: Comprehensive training in computing fundamentals, algorithms, databases and software development.

ia.degree: Specialization Course in Artificial Intelligence and Big Data
ia.description: Optimize the development of autonomous processes using Artificial Intelligence and Big Data tools.
